summary: Adds the Khamja assassins; Rafa and Malak to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=5]FFT Rafa & Malak Followers[/size][/color]


[size=4]This mod brings the Khamja assassins; Rafa and Malak from Final Fantasy Tactics into Skyrim, to the
Thalmor Headquarters in Solitude (adjusted so you will not be marked
as trespassing). [i]Ran through TES5edit & Playtested![/i] ﻿[/size]

[color=#ff0000][size=5]Features:[/size][/color]

[list]
[*][size=4]Twin mage assassins[/size]
[*][size=4]Both essential (unkillable)[/size]
[*][size=4]Rafa; restoration-oriented, uses novice-apprentice level spells (can summon flame atronachs)[/size]
[*][size=4]Malak; destruction-oriented, used apprentice-adept level spells (can summon twin frost atronachs)[/size]
[*][size=4]Both have 'lightfoot' perk, so no traps will ever be sprung![/size]
[/list]
[color=#ff0000][size=5]Credits:[/size][/color][list]
[*][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/]Kalilies & Stealthic[/url]﻿ for KS Hairdo's Renewal [/size]
[/list]
author: AedanStarfang
